You can get all of the organisations by using the global state:

    [
    {
        "id": "essent",
        "path": "D:\\Projects\\swarm-essent\\content\\Baudin999\\swarm-techlab-content\\Essent",

            "name": "Essent",

    You can also get all of the blogs from the global state:

    import globalState from './globalState.js' var blogs = globalState.getState('all_blogs');
    [
    {
        "id": "tell-a-story",
        "path": "D:\\Projects\\swarm-essent\\content\\Baudin999\\swarm-techlab-content\\Essent\\tech-lab\\tell-a-story",
        "title": "Tell a story",
        "tags": [],
        "author": "TechLab",
        "date_real": "2022-04-26T09:13:25.276Z",
        "date": "Tue Apr 26 2022",
        "author_id": "tech-lab",
        "author_role": "R&D",
        "url": "https://white-sand-0e0c61903.1.azurestaticapps.net/essent/tech-lab/tell-a-story/",
        "author_name": "TechLab",
        "link": "/essent/tech-lab/tell-a-story",
        "org_id": "essent",
        "org_name": "Essent"
    }
]
